statements: SELECT * FROM consumer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT food_item_name, rating FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM consumer_feedback WHERE food_item_name = 'Pizza';
SELECT * FROM consumer_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT food_item_name, rating, timestamp FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY rating;
SELECT * FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, food_item_name, rating FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT food_item_name, feedback_text FROM consumer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%delicious%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM consumer_feedback WHERE food_item_name = 'Pizza' OR food_item_name = 'Burger' AND rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, timestamp FROM consumer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioengineered_foods;
SELECT food_name, consumer_feedback FROM bioengineered_foods;
SELECT id, food_name FROM bioengineered_foods WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM bioengineered_foods ORDER BY food_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, effectiveness_rating FROM product_development_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM bioengineered_foods WHERE id = 1;
SELECT food_name, consumer_feedback FROM bioengineered_foods WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM product_development_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT id, food_name FROM bioengineered_foods WHERE consumer_feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_development_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating < 5 AND strategy_name LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT * FROM consumer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT food_name, ingredient, category FROM food_items WHERE category = 'Dessert';
SELECT dev_id, developer_name FROM product_development ORDER BY dev_id DESC;
SELECT food_name, ingredient, category, food_item_id FROM food_items WHERE food_name LIKE '%Pizza%';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT food_name, ingredient, category FROM food_items WHERE category = 'Dessert' ORDER BY food_item_id;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, food_name, ingredient FROM consumer_feedback cf JOIN food_items fi ON cf.food_item_id = fi.food_item_id;

SELECT feedback_text, rating, food_name, ingredient, developer_name FROM consumer_feedback cf JOIN food_items fi ON cf.food_item_id = fi.food_item_id JOIN product_development pd ON fi.food_item_id = pd.food_item_id;

SELECT dev_id, developer_name, development_status, food_name, ingredient, category FROM product_development pd JOIN food_items fi ON pd.food_item_id = fi.food_item_id ORDER BY dev_id ASC, food_item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConsumerFeedback;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM BioengineeredProducts WHERE manufacturer='ABC Inc.';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ConsumerFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(rating_id) as total_ratings FROM ProductRatings GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, insight FROM ProductAnalysis WHERE analysis_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ConsumerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM BioengineeredProducts WHERE LENGTH(ingredients) > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT rating_value, COUNT(rating_id) FROM ProductRatings GROUP BY rating_value HAVING COUNT(rating_id) > 10 ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT product_id, feedback_text FROM ConsumerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';

SELECT product_name, insight FROM BioengineeredProducts LEFT JOIN ProductAnalysis ON BioengineeredProducts.product_id = ProductAnalysis.product_id ORDER BY product_name ASC, analysis_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM consumer_feedback WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT * FROM bioengineered_food_items WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA' ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_plan FROM product_development_strategies ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT analysis_report, recommendation FROM feedback_analysis_results WHERE analyst_id = 10
SELECT feedback_text, rating, timestamp FROM consumer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT item_name, ingredients, nutrition_info FROM bioengineered_food_items WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA' ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM product_development_strategies WHERE budget >= 10000 ORDER BY budget DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT analysis_report, recommendation, analyst_id FROM feedback_analysis_results WHERE analyst_id = 123 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT product_id, feedback_id, mapping_status FROM product_feedback_mapping WHERE mapping_status = 'pending' ORDER BY product_id, feedback_id LIMIT 5
